title: Katie Price's ex Charles Drury reveals 'cocaine-fuelled romp'
text:
Katie Price's ex Charles Drury has shown his true colours with a kiss and tell in which he claimed they enjoyed a 'cocaine-fuelled' romp in a hotel spa on their first date.

In a cruel interview, the builder, 22, branded Katie, 41, who is in recovery, a zero-to-one out of ten in the bedroom and called her a 'lazy lover' after they had spent the evening bingeing on drinks and drugs.

He told The Sun that drugs were already there when he arrived and said when he woke up in the morning, Katie still hadn't gone to bed.

Tell all? Katie Price 's ex Charles Drury has shown his true colours with a kiss and tell in which he claimed they enjoyed a 'cocaine-fuelled' romp in a hotel spa on their first date

He said: 'We had a few drinks to relax and then headed up to the hotel room where we had even more and that's when things started to get intimate for the first time.'

Charles said he found the night 'disappointing' and an 'anti-climax'.

He said: 'I can't say zero, can I? I'd give her a one out of ten. She was a bit lazy, but then suddenly she would surprise you and jump on top.'

Charles claims Katie stayed up all night, while he slept and trashed the hotel room and said he had to 'pick up snotty tissues in the morning.'

Cruel: The builder, 22, branded Katie, 41, who is in recovery, a zero-to-one out of ten in the bedroom and called her a 'lazy lover' after they had spent the evening bingeing on drinks and drugs

He said: 'She was still wide awake the morning after. The hotel was a mess, so whatever she was up to in the night, I was sleeping through.'

He did defend her by saying is a good mother but is using drugs to cope, but claims she is 'all over the place'.

A spokesperson for Katie Price told MailOnline: 'There is no truth in the allegation that she is taking drugs every day and has made significant steps to being drug free.

'There have been lapses in the past but they are just that, not a regular event. Katie is still in recovery and making progress.'

The duo met earlier this year when Katie was reportedly still with her ex Kris Boyson, 30, leading to heartache however things have now ended in a bitter storm.

Kiss and tell: He told The Sun that drugs were already there when he arrived and said when he woke up in the morning, Katie still hadn't gone to bed

Katie has been hit with strife of late due to financial woes, her torrid love life and now her issues with her former flame's attempts to seemingly sell stories on her.

It was reported earlier this year that her ex Kris was left humiliated after Katie dumped him by text in August to pursue a romance with Charles.

This comes after Kris slammed the reality star for claiming all her exes rely on her to make money. The Loose Women presenter badmouthed her previous partners for 'trying to be famous' and 'becoming Mr Prices' off the back of her success.

Dumped: It was reported earlier this year that her ex Kris was left humiliated after Katie dumped him by text in August to pursue a romance with Charles

But personal trainer Kris, 30, lashed out at Katie's comments, warning: 'Don’t test me mate! I’d never become a Mr Price, thanks. I’ll always be a Boyson!'

In a new clip from her YouTube channel, Katie said: 'I wanted to do this test on looking at my exes – who they were before they met me and what they did to now they’re not with me and the difference of their life.

'They’ve become Mr Prices, try be famous, end up getting Instagram posts on the back of me, getting all jobs and being able to earn money from stories and that but always mentioning my name…'

Hurtful comments: The duo met earlier this year when Katie was reportedly still with her ex Kris Boyson, 30, leading to heartache however things have now ended in a bitter storm (pictured together in July)

Kris, who’s reportedly back with Katie despite her playing away with Charles, insists he’s never sold a story and hasn’t done any paid-for Instagram posts as a result of his romance with the model.

He added: 'I'm a respectful gentleman! I do the same job I've done since before I met ya. I done TV before I met ya.

'I ain’t done paid Instagram posts. I ain’t sold stories, ain’t tried becoming a model and I’d never become a Mr Price.' (sic)

Katie has son Harvey, 17, with ex-footballer Dwight Yorke, 47, son Junior, 14, and daughter Princess Tiaamii, 12, with ex-husband Peter Andre and son Jett, six, and daughter Bunny, five, with Kieran.
description: Katie Price's ex has shown his true colours with a kiss and tell in which he claimed they enjoyed a 'cocaine-fuelled' romp in a hotel spa on their first date.
